result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Louay R Srougi appeared by video.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted appeared by video for Louay R Srougi.  Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Status conference held. Defense requested a plea and sentencing hearing date. Case adjourned to Branch 1.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Louay R Srougi appeared by video.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted appeared by video for Louay R Srougi.  
Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Hearing held via Zoom.  Status conference held.  Atty. Plaisted would like time to discusss the offer with his client and requests another status date. Case is adjourned to Br. 1. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 9-22-2022, filed.  rmm

Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court, defendant Louay R Srougi not in court, in custody, appearance waived.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Hearing held via Zoom.  Pretrial conference held.  Atty. Plaisted was recently appointed and would like a status date.  Case adjourned to Br. 1.   This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties. Status conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
No contact order signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with FM.  Court advised Defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

DUE TO TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES THIS CASE WAS HEARD OFF THE RECORD.
Defendant Louay R Srougi in court with attorney Jane Jerman.  Defendant Louay R Srougi in custody.  Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Louay R Srougi appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
